The terrain and climate of Jiangdong provide myriad challenges to northerners who venture south of the Great River. To those whose family have made this land their home for generations, however, such challenges are boons and bounties.

Bei Yu thrives on his independence and free spirit - but keeping such dreams aloft is a task not without hampering difficulty.

Some of us are sadly not destined for either fame or glory, and must find satisfaction with whatever existence the heavens will of us.

Su Kelan is a rather immature and naive lady, still at the stage in her life where the entire world revolves around her whims and wishes. Someday, she shall have to learn that she cannot have everything she desires, regardless of how loudly she whines for it.
